channel.title: Boredom banners
channel.description:
V1: [IMG]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/6615/sig2n.png[/img]
V2: [IMG]http://img682.imageshack.us/img682/2823/sigcw.png[/img]
Rate n Hate i guess?
Basic summary - this was a test of some new fonts i downloaded.
If you havn't noticed, i like plain simplistic banners, i hate bulky full images with too much random shit on it.
